Greetings to Jamaican Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Jamaican Prime Minister 
    Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju sent a message of greetings to Jamaican Prime Minister P. J. Patterson on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of its independence.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the future, too, the message wished him success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.

Paek Nam Sun Meets Director-General of FAO
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Meets Director-General of FAO
    Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and had a friendly talk with Jaques Diouf, director-general of the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO), who paid a courtesy call on him today.
